name: Verify that field FEIN should be mandatory and Business Description should be optional on Policy

testSteps.description:
When underwriter updates Description <BusinessDescription>, FEIN <FEIN>, Contact's Email<ContactEmail> and Phone<Phone> as
| FEIN | ContactEmail | Phone |
|  |  |  |
Then validation message FEIN, Contact's Email and Phone should be thrown 'This is a required field. Please input value.'
And there should not be any validations on Business Description
